ai-patthana19.15:0.2_0: under the investigation of the Dhamma: One whatever is suitable for the three times of the Dhamma
ai-patthana19.15:2.1_0: for the sake of extremely things ...
ai-patthana19.15:4.1_0: There is no reason for teaching that arises dependent on the inside,
ai-patthana19.15:5.1_0: Not by means of principles, externally ...
ai-patthana19.15:6.1_0: Not internally and externally, etc., there are two conditions for the object,
ai-patthana19.15:6.1_1: This is the section in brief.
ai-patthana19.15:7.1_0: ‘... for the sake of the six objects, that is to say, there are two degree of clusters who were free from fear and dread.’ ...
